Translations.Text: Nos dictus to angels, Fall prostrate Adam. They fell prostrate Satan. He became jinn he disobeyed order His Dominus. Vos choose eum his descendants prout dominus Me et they est tuus enemies? Quod miserable substitute
Ego nunquam permitted them testis creation de caelum terra nor creation de themselves! Nor perfecit ego permit wicked work My regnum
Feria advenit when He dictus Alias My partners vos claimed est deus Me they alias on them they non respond them. insurmountable barrier separate them ex each alius
guilty testimentum vide Hell realize they fall it They non habet escape therefrom
